title: China is the world's 'biggest captor of journalists' with 127 detained, report says
content:
1. China is the world's 'biggest captor of journalists' with 127 detained, report says  The Washington Post
  2. China is biggest captor of journalists, says report  BBC News
  3. Number of jailed journalists reached global high in 2021, at least 24 killed for their coverage -CPJ report  Reuters
  4. A record number of journalists are in prison right now, according to press freedom report  CNN
  5. Journalists in China face ‘nightmare’ worthy of Mao era, press freedom group says  The Guardian
contentSnippet:
China is the world's 'biggest captor of journalists' with 127 detained, report says  The Washington Post
China is biggest captor of journalists, says report  BBC News
Number of jailed journalists reached global high in 2021, at least 24 killed for their coverage -CPJ report  Reuters
A record number of journalists are in prison right now, according to press freedom report  CNN
Journalists in China face ‘nightmare’ worthy of Mao era, press freedom group says  The Guardian

localize.title: 中国は世界で最もジャーナリストを拘束している国であり、127名が拘束されていると報告書が発表
报告称中国是世界上 "最大的记者俘虏国"，有127名记者被拘留
報告稱中國是世界上 "最大的記者俘虜國"，有127名記者被拘留
